titleStmt.title: The first set of English madrigales to 3. 4. 5. and 6. voices. Newly composed by Thomas Bateson ...
Madrigals. 1st set
titleStmt.author: Bateson, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Signatures: [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-C⁴; [A]² B⁴.
Six partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Bassus."; part 5: "Quintus."; part 6: "Sextus.".
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford, England.
